violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements
package name similar to existing packages
repo URL does not end with /name.jl.git

discussion.author: svilupp
discussion.text:
STOP! This is duplicative and no longer needed.

This was a package rename due to the reported name similarity: https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/124608

IT seems that Gunnar F has overridden the auto-merge blocker on the original name, so this PR can be removed! I'll revert all changes and proceed with the original name.

Please close this one
